title: SILKYPIX Developer Studio 9.1.8.0 – RAW photo correction

title: FlexTime 1.4 – Versatile timer for your repetitive activities
content: FlexTime is a timer for repetitive activities. Use it for scheduling your workday activities, stretch breaks, dance, meditation – you name it!   Design a routine of timed activities and assign them custom cues of various types: play a sound, run a script, show a text message, or speak text.   FlexTime is fully AppleScriptable. title: Hegis’ Grasp: Evil Resurrected 2.0.3 – A story-driven, atmospheric survival horror game
content: 1896, Great Britain: Henry Wood, a journalist who heard rumors of a village, that supposedly had undergone a curse, gets curious enough to check out the place for his latest anticipated newspaper story. title: Cook, Serve, Delicious! 2!! 2.6.0 m.1.1 – Restaurant Simulation & Management Game

title: Disk Cleaner 1.6 – Free Your Hard Drive Space
content: Disk Cleaner does all the work for you! We’ve optimized the most efficient locations to quickly scan and remove all the junk taking up your valuable disk space. title: Fluid Browser 1.6 – A new evolution to multitasking on your computer
content: Fluid is a floating browser built to view your favorite media like Netflix, Youtube, and Hulu right alongside your work. Fluid works just like any other browser; however, once active, Fluid only shows your media or web content, hiding all other features of the browser.   Features There is only so much space on your […]

title: Amber’s Airline 1.8 – Time Management Simulation & Casual Game

title: Temp Monitor 1.2.4 – Monitor your Mac’s temperature
content: Temp Monitor app is an unobtrusive tool which will alert you when your Mac overheats, and the perfect utility to help you log all instances when the processor goes beyond a temperature which might be dangerous for both your Mac and yourself, if you’re using a MacBook or MacBook Pro.   Features Support for customizable […]

title: JustBroadcaster for Facebook 2.1.6 – Video streaming for Facebook on your Mac
content: JustBroadcaster for Facebook allows you to live stream from your Mac. Just insert the video sources into the prepared templates and start stream. Easy logo and background setup.
